title: No outgoing mail, Windows 11
content:
This began about 2 weeks ago. I have email for my business with my domain name (Laurel@handknitting.com), and both my personal (laurelmurphy@fastmail.com) and business email are managed by Rackspace. Only the outgoing mail on my business email is affected.

Here is the error msg I got today when trying to send from business to private email: "Sending of the message failed. An error occurred while sending mail. The mail server responded: <laurel@handknitting.com>: Sender address rejected: Access denied. Please check the message recipient "laurelmurphy@fastmail.com" and try again.

Rackspace support was able to send successfully from their webmail and from Microsoft outlook using my business email. All of the SMTP settings are exactly the same for both my business and personal accounts. It is clearly not the server, it is TB. Their suggestion was to uninstall TB and reinstall, or change the client.

What do you suggest? TIA, Laurel
creator: laurelmurphy

title: Trouble Moving Old profile to new pc

When I go into new Thunderbird and choose "open profile folder", it shows me 3 files: the two that the system created in the new download, plus the old Profile that I pasted there. title: Thunderbird won't connect to Spectrum netmail
content: My explanation might be confusing, for which I apologize in advance. I have Spectrum netmail. I recently installed Thunderbird; that went off without a hitch. When I open Thunderbird and try to get it to connect to Spectrum, I put in my full name, email address and password. Thunderbird then comes up with a configuration. However, when I hit "done," I get the following message: "Unable to log in at server. Probably wrong configuration, username or password." I thought this was a Spectrum problem, but after inquiring, they told me it was a Thunderbird problem. I have attempted to connect several times and have checked my username and password carefully to make sure they were correct. I have also attempted to configure manually, and that has also been unsuccessful. However, the hostname (mobile.charter.net), the incoming server port (993) and the outgoing server port (587) are all correct, according to information I saw on the Spectrum website. I'd welcome any suggestions to fix this problem. Thanks in advance.

title: Not saving passwords
content:
On an old Windows 7 Pro (SP1) 32 bit workstation (with .Net 4.8), I recently updated from Thunderbird 45.1.0 to version 115.18.0 (most recent for Windows 7). The update worked fine, but afterwards the new version is not saving passwords. While entering a password every time is possible, I have 7 email accounts and that gets tedious. I can't keep TB open as it uses a lot more memory than the older version, so either I get this fixed or I have to use other software.

I have not set up a master password because it won't even save that. When I enter a password (for email login) without asking it to save it, the login works and email works fine; but if I ask it to save the password, the login does not work and it errors out. This could be simply a timeout trying to save the password, so the main thing is to resolve why TB is not able to save any passwords.

Thanks for your time and help.
creator: mtb23

title: DNS Failure with VPN active after sleep on Mac
content:
I have a repeatable issue that was present in Firefox but is now fixed (automatically, nothing I did). Hoping that we can find a solution in Thunderbird also.

I have a Mac (Intel) with a VPN connection (wireguard) to my office just for office traffic. Regular traffic bypasses the VPN. Every time the machine goes to sleep for an extended amount of time (overnight), Thunderbird's DNS resolutions fail. I have 8 different IMAP accounts (including 2 gmail accounts). None are using the VPN connection but direct email address.

After sleep, there is no more connections and the culprit is DNS failures on all accounts. This is the only software (and I have many running simultaneously!) that is affected. Solution is to shutdown Thunderbird and restart. Resetting the dnscache on mac doesn't work. *SOMETIMES* disconnecting from VPN and reconnecting resets it, but not always.

I had the issue with both Mozilla products (Firefox and Thunderbird) and was just living with it. But a recent update in Firefox fixed it on that software. I haven't looked at the release logs to see if anything changed.

So I'm guessing there is something we can do with Thunderbird to reset the DNS or something else when it comes back from sleep.

Let me know if any more information would be helpful.

Current Version is Thunderbird Nebula 128.7.0esr (64-bit)
creator: laxamar

title: links
content: Version 128.6.1esr, This just recently started. When I open an email and navigate to an advertisement picture within that email I used to be able to left click on that picture and it would open up a window in my chrome web browser. Now, when I navigate to that picture, all it does is show the icon that allows you to expand the size of that picture. Any idea's on how I can restore it back to the mouse arrow to allow me to click on the embedded link within the picture?
creator: bevans75

title: No puedo abrir enlaces desde el email recibido
content:
Hola! Tengo actualizado Thunderbird a la ultima version 128.7.0 y uso Windows 10. El caso es que no puedo abrir enlaces desde el email recibido y no encuentro la opción para poder solucionarlo. Podrían ayudarme? he buscado en mensajes de ayuda pero no me aparecen algunas opciones a las que hacen referencia. Adjunto una captura de ejemplo de email recibido en el que hay un enlace y no puedo clicar sobre él para que lo abra directamente, para abrirlo tengo que copiar toda la direccion, abrir un navegador y pegarla.

Muchas gracias de antemano!

Sergio
creator: SergioBCN

title: no response
content: Since some weeks TB is getting extremely disabled: very often apeears the message "no response" (German: keine Rückmeldung), and I can´t go on working with TB, just have to wait 5 til 10 ore more seconds. I guess, TB is dowloading emails ("456 of 1367" something like that is the message downside the window). That happens repeatingly. I have no idea when and why. I am managing 5 eMail IMAP accounts. Only in one account the inbox contains also the trash, the sent, the archive and other directories, which do not belong to the inbox. But I can not move them to the main directory of the account. All other Account seem to have the correct directory system. What to do?
creator: muellerweichold

title: Stopping Thunderbird From Checking My Gmail Account
content:
Who in the world had the bright idea of Thunderbird constantly asking permission to check my Gmail account?

I've read a lot and tried everything, but I can't stop it.

I discovered that my Gmail account is listed in the config file. If I delete all the references to my Gmail account in the config file, will that mess up Thunderbird?

Thanks in advance for help.
creator: weellarr

title: Thunderbird Not Prompting for New Password After Email Password Change
content:
We recently changed our email password on GoDaddy (Microsoft 365 email), but Thunderbird is still able to send and receive emails without prompting us to enter the new password. Previously, after changing the password, Thunderbird would stop working and ask us to update the credentials.

Why is Thunderbird not prompting us to enter a new password? Is there a caching issue, or has something changed in Thunderbird's authentication process? What should we do to force Thunderbird to request the new password?
creator: naomiyangwork233

title: Criar mais de uma assinatura no thunderbird
content:
Olá, espero poder colaborar para a comunidade com minha duvida. Eu gostaria de criar mais de uma assinatura que eu possa selecionar quando for criar um e-mail. meu e-mail serve para assuntos profissionais e para assuntos pessoais e gostaria de, na hora que estou criando meu e-mail selecionar a assinatura adequada pelo assunto.

desde já agradeço a atenção de todos. Rinaldo
creator: rmirandabh

title: Cannot access email after 01/13/25
content: I have not been able to access email at the email address (erols.com) on my account after 01/13/2025. I note that I have been receiving the email on my iphone and that I have been receiving email for other addresses, i.e., kubovcik.com and gmail.com on Thunderbird ). When I try to access the email via Thunderbird, I receive a message stating that "The certificate for pop.erols.com is not valid for that server." I contacted the company handling my erols.com email, i.e., Astound, and was advised that the certificate for the server is valid and that the problem may have been caused by an update of Thunderbird. I also attempted a server certificate error exception, which dis not work. What can I do?
creator: kubopat

title: Thunderbird cursor
